ygData.subject: E'ci Shadowman hunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Any L24+ Necros who want to group w/ me to kill shadownmen I need to get my faction p. My name on E ci is FRAAL  I am a L29 Ogre Shaman and I know you want
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Any L24+ Necros who want to group w/ me to kill shadownmen I need to get my faction p.


My name on E'ci is FRAAL I am a L29 Ogre Shaman and I know you want the mask, well I just need faction and me and my L27 Ogre Warrior Brother would love to help you get the mask, while we gain faction.

give me (FRAAL) a tell! :-)

PS I don't care if you 50th lvl I don't want eps or loot, just faction. ;-) thanks

-Fraal



----- Original Message -----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 11:51 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?


*laugh*
I don't have the globe of shadow yet, but I wanted to
run around in the mask(for the night anyway) and I
thought you meant you had equipped it. By the way, not
to rub it in or anything, I got the shadow book in the
first 10 kills yesterday. :)

Darkmoon Somberlight

--- Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...> wrote:
> DOH!!!!! you turn in the mask, and i believe the
> globe of shadow, large
> shadow silk, a werebat wing to get the robe, you
> don't want to equip it. To
> me the mask was by far the longest i have had to
> camp for something (hadn't
> camped for jboots). I still haven't seen the book
> of shadows dropped yet
> though.
>

=====
